structure.unit: The General Laws, And Express Repeal Of Certain Acts And Resolves
The General Laws And Their Effect

law.catch_line: Temporary Laws; Effect Of Enactment Of General Laws
law.text: All acts and resolves or parts thereof in force at the time of the taking effect of the General Laws which are of limited duration shall continue in effect according to their terms, notwithstanding any provisions of said General Laws inconsistent therewith.
